participant_1.background:
I'll be running around town for inspiration while my baby monitor keeps an eye on my little one!
both my parents were over 6 foot tall.
I love my family and friends, who are always supportive of my creative endeavors.
i spend my free time volunteering at nursing homes.
I like to listen to music on my way to work.

participant_2.background:
I go running to stay fit and it helps me clear my mind after a long day at work.
My family is my world and I love to explore new places with them.
I baked a lot of cakes for my family and friends last year.
we live in a rural area.
I created a new car design in my head.

content.text: Hi, I'm going for a run. What are you up to today?
Hi, me too! I love running to clear my mind. What about you?
Running is great for that. I like to listen to music on my way to work.
I run to stay fit. I live in a rural area, so it's easy to get some good running in.
I would love to live in a rural area. I grew up in the suburbs, but I've always loved nature.
The suburbs are nice too! I like the convenience of being close to everything.
I agree. It's nice to be able to get to the city quickly when I need to.
What do you like to do for fun in the city?
I love to go to museums and art galleries. I also enjoy going to concerts and plays.
Those are all great ways to spend time in the city! I love going to museums too.
What's your favorite museum in the city?
I love the Metropolitan Museum of Art. It's so big and there's so much to see.
That's my favorite too! I could spend hours there.
Me too! I love to go there and just wander around.
It's the best way to explore.
